name: NPC
text: Hahaha, it's time for the plot twist.

name: NPC
text: Did you ever think of why I know this dungeon so well? Did you ever think where I was on this level? Did you miss me?

name: NPC
text: And you don't say anything back!

name: NPC
text: I always wanted to have a wife, so... I took yours!

name: NPC
text: Now it's time for you to disappear from this world and to show my new wife that you are dead!
